name: bolt-strike
caption: Bolt Strike

effect.short: Has a 20% chance to [paralyze]{mechanic:paralysis} the target.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a 20% chance to [paralyze]{mechanic:paralyze} the target.

flavorText:
The user surrounds itself with a great amount of
electricity and charges its target. This may also
leave the target with paralysis.
